name: RI_1_2_2_Manage_Record_Entries_for_Legal_Hold
title: RI.1.2.2 Manage Record Entries for Legal Hold (Function)
description: Manage/Preserve Record Entries for Legal Hold (Multiple instances)
purpose:
Occurs when a set of Record Entries is designated to be held for legal purposes or proceedings.
- Ensures preservation of a set of Record Entries for a designated time, held without alteration.

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [RI.1.1.23](Requirements-EHRSFMR2-RI.1.1.23.html) (Place Record Entries on Legal Hold).

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [RI.1.1.24](Requirements-EHRSFMR2-RI.1.1.24.html) (Release Record Entries from Legal Hold).

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to control access to data/records during legal hold, preventing un-auditable alteration or unauthorized use for preservation purposes.

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to maintain records beyond normal retention period according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture the reason for preserving records beyond the normal retention period.

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render a legal hold notice identifying who to contact for questions when a user attempts to alter a record on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.2.2#07
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to render Record Entry content preserved for a legal hold by type, class or encounter (e.g., medical Record Entry or report, e-mail, metadata, etc.), conforming to function [RI.1.1.13](Requirements-EHRSFMR2-RI.1.1.13.html) (Extract Record Entry Content).
